author: Staff Reporter
text:
Siva alias Sivaperuman (39) of Ezhusattupathu village near Kanyakumari was detained under Goondas Act.

He is a close relative of a history-sheeter murdered inside the Nagercoil sub-jail a few years ago. He was involved in many cases of attempt to murder, murder threat and other crimes in the district. Superintendent of Police G. Dharmarajan recommended his detention under Goondas Act to Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan, who issued the order. Siva was arrested and lodged at Palayamkottai Central prison.
title: Man detained
